about_the_game:
This is a trial version of Abyssmare. Thank you for taking note of this demo. Please install it for free and help me provide feedback on your experience.

This will help me with the final debugging of the upcoming official version.

You can leave a comment or send an email to“ mrpanda2024@126.com Provide feedback on the strengths, weaknesses, and bugs of the game.

I also hope this demo can bring you some pleasant experiences.

Thank you again for your help.
